subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When the Liberty opens its season Sunday at Madison Square Garden against Chicago, Shay Doron, a 5-foot-9 guard, will become the first Israeli to play in the W.N.B.A.
snippet: When the Liberty opens its season Sunday at Madison Square Garden against Chicago, Shay Doron, a 5-foot-9 guard, will become the first Israeli to play in the W.N.B.A.
